Class Time

Time
All Implemented Interfaces:

class Time extends Object implements Comparable<Time>

    • Time

      public Time(int hours, int minutes, String meridian) throws InvalidTime
      Secondary Time constructor
      Parameters:
      hours - Integer value to 12-hour time value
      minutes - Integer value to 60-minute time value
      meridian - String value for AM or PM
      Throws:
      InvalidTime - Custom Exception class when exception raised
